verses.name: Job 38:23
verses.text: Which I have reserved against the time of trouble, against the day of battle and war?

verses.name: Job 38:24
verses.text: By what way is the light parted, which scattereth the east wind upon the earth?

verses.name: Job 38:25
verses.text: Who hath divided a watercourse for the overflowing of waters, or a way for the lightning of thunder;

verses.name: Job 38:26
verses.text: To cause it to rain on the earth, where no man is; on the wilderness, wherein there is no man;

verses.name: Job 38:27
verses.text: To satisfy the desolate and waste ground; and to cause the bud of the tender herb to spring forth?
